mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADMISSIONS ( ADMISSION_YEAR, ADMISSION_TYPE, EARLY_ADMISSION, REGULAR_ADMISSION, SCHOOL_ID, DEPARTMENT_ID, ADMISSION_MEMO, CREATED_BY, UPDATED_BY ) VALUES ( #{admissionYear}, #{admissionType}, #{earlyAdmission}, #{regularAdmission}, #{schoolId}, #{departmentId}, #{admissionMemo}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy} )
mapper.select: SELECT -- 입시 요강 정보 A.ADMISSION_ID, A.ADMISSION_YEAR, A.ADMISSION_TYPE, A.EARLY_ADMISSION, A.REGULAR_ADMISSION, A.SCHOOL_ID, A.DEPARTMENT_ID, A.ADMISSION_MEMO, A.CREATED_AT, A.UPDATED_AT, A.CREATED_BY, A.UPDATED_BY, -- 학교 정보 B.SCHOOL_NAME, -- 학과 정보 C.DEPARTMENT_NAME, -- 등록한 사람, 수정한 사람 D.USER_NAME AS CREATED_USER_NAME, D.USER_PHONE AS CREATED_USER_PHONE, E.USER_NAME AS UPDATED_USER_NAME, E.USER_PHONE AS UPDATED_USER_PHONE FROM ADMISSIONS A LEFT JOIN SCHOOLS B ON B.SCHOOL_ID = A.SCHOOL_ID LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENTS C ON C.DEPARTMENT_ID = A.DEPARTMENT_ID LEFT JOIN USERS D ON D.USER_ID = A.CREATED_BY LEFT JOIN USERS E ON E.USER_ID = A.UPDATED_BY WHERE A.ADMISSION_ID = #{admissionId} LIMIT 1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ADMISSIONS WHERE ADMISSION_ID = #{admissionId} LIMIT 1
